participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Passionate and determined, always pushing towards his dreams while juggling responsibilities.
participant_1.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, with a love for thrill-seeking activities and a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all. i do like watching cooking shows. hello i just moved here from germany.

content.text: I like to sing, but I do not know
